DESCRIPTION: Manage role rewards for your servers leveling system.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}levelrole [#] [role]** ~ Gives a role when the user achieves this level.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}levelrole [#] [role] [role2]** ~ Gives multiple roles to a user when they achieve a level.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: â€¢ Advanced: You can use the unique rolesets to make sure that a user only has 1 level role at any time.
ALIASES: Levelrole does not have any aliases.
SUCCESS: The role rewards for level #{{level}} have been updated to {{roles}}.
